################################################################################################ ## Configuration template for GXP21xx/GXP14XX/11XX firmware version 1.0.5.15 ################################################################################################
############################################################################## ## Advanced/System-wide Options ##############################################################################
# Enable Provider Lock. 0 - No, 1 - Yes. P9999 = 0
# Provider Lock Key. A string of up to 16 bytes. P9998 =
# Provider Authentication. A string of up to 16 bytes P9997 =
# Password for configuration file authentication P1 = # Admin password for web interface P2 = %%DESKPHONE_PASSWORD%%
# Layer 3 QoS (IP Diff-Serv or Precedence value for RTP) P38 = 48
# Layer 2 QoS. 802.1Q/VLAN Tag (VLAN classification for RTP) P51 = 0
# Layer 2 QoS. 802.1p priority value (0 - 7) P87 = 0
{IF network=REMOTESTUN} # Local RTP port (1024-65535, default 5004) P39 = %%rtp_port_min%% # STUN server P76 = %%pbx_ip%%:%%param::sipport%% {ELSE} # Local RTP port (1024-65535, default 5004) P39 = 5004 # STUN server P76 = {ENDIF}
# Use Random Port. 0 - no, 1 - yes P78 = 0
# Keep-alive interval (in seconds. default 20 seconds) P84 = 20
# Use NAT IP. This will enable our SIP client to use this IP in the SIP/SDP message. Example 64.3.153.50. P101 =
#------------------------------------------------------------- # Firmware Upgrade #------------------------------------------------------------- # Firmware Upgrade and Provisioning # 0 - Always Check For New Firmware # 1 - Check New Firmware only when F/W pre/suffix changes # 2 - Always Skip the Firmware Check P238 = 0
# XML Config File Password P1359 =
# HTTP/HTTPS User Name P1360 =
# HTTP/HTTPS Password P1361 =
{IF network=LOCALLAN} # Firmware Upgrade. 0 - TFTP Upgrade, 1 - HTTP Upgrade, 2 - HTTPS Upgrade P212 = 1
# Firmware Server Path P192 = %%PROVLINKLOCAL.HOST%%:%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PORT%%%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PATH%%/firmware/grandstream # Config Server Path P237 = %%PROVLINKLOCAL.HOST%%:%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PORT%%%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PATH%%
{ELSE} # Firmware Upgrade. 0 - TFTP Upgrade, 1 - HTTP Upgrade, 2 - HTTPS Upgrade P212 = 2
# Firmware Server Path P192 = %%PROVLINK.HOST%%:%%PROVLINK.PORT%%%%PROVLINK.PATH%%/firmware/grandstream # Config Server Path P237 = %%PROVLINK.HOST%%:%%PROVLINK.PORT%%%%PROVLINK.PATH%% {ENDIF}
# Firmware File Prefix P232 =
# Firmware File Postfix P233 =
# Config File Prefix P234 =
# Config File Postfix P235 =
# Allow DHCP Option43 and Option 66 to override server: 0 - No, 1 - Yes. Default is Yes. # When set to Yes(1), it will override the configured provision path and method. P145 = 0
# Automatic Upgrade. 0 - No, 1 - Yes. Default is No. P194 = 1
# Check for new firmware every () minutes, unit is in minute, minimum 60 minutes, default is 7 days. P193 = 10080
# Authenticate Conf File. 0 - No, 1 - Yes. Default is No. P240 = 0
# Enable TR069. 0 - No, 1 - Yes. Default is No. # P1409 = 0
# ACS URL P4503 = # TR-069 Username P4504 =
# TR-069 Password P4505 = # Periodic Inform Enable. 0 - No, 1 - Yes. P4506 = 0
# Periodic Inform Interval. P4507 =
# Connection Request Username P4511 =
# Connection Request Password P4512 =
# Authentication Method. 0 - No Authentication, 1 - Basic, 2 - Digest P4519 = 2
# Connection Request Port P4518 =
#---------------------------------------- # XML Phonebook #---------------------------------------- # Enable Phonebook XML Download # 0 = No # 1 = YES, HTTP # 2 = YES, TFTP # 3 = YES, HTTPS # Default is No. {IF network=LOCALLAN} P330 = 1
# Phonebook XML Server Path # This is a string of up to 128 characters that should contain a path to the XML file. # It MUST be in the host/path format. For example: "directory.grandstream.com/engineering" P331 = %%PROVLINKLOCAL.HOST%%:%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PORT%%%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PATH%%
{ELSE} P330 = 3
# Phonebook XML Server Path # This is a string of up to 128 characters that should contain a path to the XML file. # It MUST be in the host/path format. For example: "directory.grandstream.com/engineering" P331 = %%PROVLINK.HOST%%:%%PROVLINK.PORT%%%%PROVLINK.PATH%% {ENDIF}
# Phonebook Download Interval # This is an integer variable in hours. # Valid value range is 0-720 (default 0), and greater values will default to 720 P332 = 12
# Remove Manually-edited entries on Download # 0 - No, 1 - Yes, other values ignored P333 = 1
# LDAP Directory # LDAP Script Server Path P1304 =
#--------------------------------------- # XML Idle Screen #--------------------------------------- # Enable Idle Screen XML Download # 0 = No # 1 = YES, HTTP # 2 = YES, TFTP # 3 = YES, HTTPS # Default is No
{IF network=LOCALLAN} P340 = 1
# Idle Screen XML Server Path # This is a string of up to 128 characters that should contain a path to the XML file. # It MUST be in the host/path format. For example: "directory.grandstream.com/engineering" {IF ua=GXP1160} P341 = %%PROVLINKLOCAL.HOST%%:%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PORT%%%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PATH%%/logo/idle_screen.xml.gxp1160 {ENDIF} {IF ua=GXP1165} P341 = %%PROVLINKLOCAL.HOST%%:%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PORT%%%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PATH%%/logo/idle_screen.xml.gxp1160 {ENDIF} {IF ua=GXP1400} P341 = %%PROVLINKLOCAL.HOST%%:%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PORT%%%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PATH%%/logo/idle_screen.xml.gxp1400 {ENDIF} {IF ua=GXP1405} P341 = %%PROVLINKLOCAL.HOST%%:%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PORT%%%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PATH%%/logo/idle_screen.xml.gxp1400 {ENDIF} {IF ua=GXP1450} P341 = %%PROVLINKLOCAL.HOST%%:%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PORT%%%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PATH%%/logo/idle_screen.xml.gxp1450 {ENDIF} {IF ua=GXP2100} P341 = %%PROVLINKLOCAL.HOST%%:%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PORT%%%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PATH%%/logo/idle_screen.xml.gxp2100 {ENDIF} {IF ua=GXP2110} P341 = %%PROVLINKLOCAL.HOST%%:%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PORT%%%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PATH%%/logo/idle_screen.xml.gxp2110 {ENDIF} {IF ua=GXP2120} P341 = %%PROVLINKLOCAL.HOST%%:%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PORT%%%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PATH%%/logo/idle_screen.xml.gxp2120 {ENDIF} {IF ua=GXP2124} P341 = %%PROVLINKLOCAL.HOST%%:%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PORT%%%%PROVLINKLOCAL.PATH%%/logo/idle_screen.xml.gxp2124 {ENDIF}
{ELSE} P340 = 3
# Idle Screen XML Server Path # This is a string of up to 128 characters that should contain a path to the XML file. # It MUST be in the host/path format. For example: "directory.grandstream.com/engineering" {IF ua=GXP1160} P341 = %%PROVLINK.HOST%%:%%PROVLINK.PORT%%%%PROVLINK.PATH%%/logo/idle_screen.xml.gxp1160 {ENDIF} {IF ua=GXP1165} P341 = %%PROVLINK.HOST%%:%%PROVLINK.PORT%%%%PROVLINK.PATH%%/logo/idle_screen.xml.gxp1160 {ENDIF} {IF ua=GXP1400} P341 = %%PROVLINK.HOST%%:%%PROVLINK.PORT%%%%PROVLINK.PATH%%/logo/idle_screen.xml.gxp1400 {ENDIF} {IF ua=GXP1405} P341 = %%PROVLINK.HOST%%:%%PROVLINK.PORT%%%%PROVLINK.PATH%%/logo/idle_screen.xml.gxp1400 {ENDIF} {IF ua=GXP1450} P341 = %%PROVLINK.HOST%%:%%PROVLINK.PORT%%%%PROVLINK.PATH%%/logo/idle_screen.xml.gxp1450 {ENDIF} {IF ua=GXP2100} P341 = %%PROVLINK.HOST%%:%%PROVLINK.PORT%%%%PROVLINK.PATH%%/logo/idle_screen.xml.gxp2100 {ENDIF} {IF ua=GXP2110} P341 = %%PROVLINK.HOST%%:%%PROVLINK.PORT%%%%PROVLINK.PATH%%/logo/idle_screen.xml.gxp2110 {ENDIF} {IF ua=GXP2120} P341 = %%PROVLINK.HOST%%:%%PROVLINK.PORT%%%%PROVLINK.PATH%%/logo/idle_screen.xml.gxp2120 {ENDIF} {IF ua=GXP2124} P341 = %%PROVLINK.HOST%%:%%PROVLINK.PORT%%%%PROVLINK.PATH%%/logo/idle_screen.xml.gxp2124 {ENDIF}
{ENDIF}
# Download Screen XML At Boot-up. 0 - no, 1 - yes P1349 = 1
# Use Custom File Name. 0 - no, 1 - yes P1343 = 1
#--------------------------------------- # XML Application #--------------------------------------- # Server Path P337 =
# Softkey Label P352 = XML Service
# Offhook Auto Dial P71 =
# Syslog Server (name of the server, max length is 64 characters) P207 =
# Syslog Level (Default setting is NONE) # 0 - NONE, 1 - DEBUG, 2 - INFO, 3 - WARNING, 4 - ERROR P208 = 0
# Send SIP Log. 0 - Do not send SIP log in Syslog, 1 - Send SIP log in Syslog if configured and set to DEBUG level P1387 = 0 # NTP Server P30 = %%param::time_ntp_server%%
# Allow DHCP Option 42 to override NTP server. 0 - No, 1 - Yes. Default is No. # When set to Yes(1), it will override the configured NTP server. P144 = 0 # SSL Certificate #P280 =
# SSL Private Key #P279 =
# SSL Private Key Password #P281 =
#--------------------------------------- # Disctinctive Ring Tone #--------------------------------------- #Setting for distinctive ringing base on altert info #info=external -- call from external line (no reformatting has been applied) #info=international -- call from external line, reformatting detected international call #info=national -- call from external line, reformatting detected national call #info=local -- call from external line, reformatting detected local call #info=queue -- call from queue #info=ivr -- call from IVR
# Matching Incoming Caller ID. Matching Rule 1 # String P1488 = external
# Matching Rule 1 Distinctive Ringtone # 0 - system ring tone, 1 - custom ring tone 1, 2 - custom ring tone 2, 3 - custom ring tone 3. Default is 0. # Number: 0, 1, 2, 3 # Mandatory P1489 = 1
# Matching Incoming Caller ID. Matching Rule 2 # String P1490 = queue
# Matching Rule 2 Distinctive Ringtone # 0 - system ring tone, 1 - custom ring tone 1, 2 - custom ring tone 2, 3 - custom ring tone 3. Default is 0 # Number: 0, 1, 2, 3 # Mandatory P1491 = 2
# Matching Incoming Caller ID. Matching Rule 3 # String P1492 = ivr
# Matching Rule 3 Distinctive Ringtone # 0 - system ring tone, 1 - custom ring tone 1, 2 - custom ring tone 2, 3 - custom ring tone 3. Default is 0 # Number: 0, 1, 2, 3 # Mandatory P1493 = 3
# System Ring Tone P345 = f1=440,f2=480,c=200/400;
### Call Progress Tones ### # Syntax: f1=val,f2=val[,c=on1/off1[-on2/off2[-on3/off3]]]; # (Frequencies are in Hz and cadence on and off are in 10ms) # Dial Tone P343 = f1=350,f2=440;
# Message Waiting P344 = f1=350,f2=440,c=10/10;
# Ring Back Tone P346 = f1=440,f2=480,c=200/400;
# Call-Waiting Tone P347 = f1=440,f2=440,c=25/525;
# Busy Tone P348 = f1=480,f2=620,c=50/50;
# Reorder Tone P349 = f1=480,f2=620,c=25/25;
# Intercom User ID. (Account 1) P1303 =
# Disable Call Waiting. 0 - no, 1 - yes P91 = 0
# Disable Call-Waiting Tone. 0 - no, 1 - yes P186 = 0
# Disable Direct IP Call. 0 - no, 1 - yes P1310 = 0
# Use Quick IP-call mode. 0 - no, 1 - yes P184 = 0
# Disable Conference. 0 - no, 1 - yes P1311 = 0
# Enable Muliti-Purpose-Key sending DTMF, 0 - no, 1 - yes P1339 = 0
# Disable DND Button. 0 - no, 1 - yes P1340 = 0
# DND On - P2344 and DND Off - P2345 P2344 = %%param::DIALCODEPROFILE%%2 P2345 = %%param::DIALCODEPROFILE%%0
# Disable Transfer. 0 - no, 1 - yes P1341 = 0
# Enable Auto-attended Transfer, 0 - No, 1 -Yes. Default is 0 P1376 = 0 # Configuration Via Keypad Menu. 0 - Unrestricted, 1 - Basic settings only, 2 - Constraint mode P1357 = 0
# Enable STAR key Keypad locking. 0 - no, 1 - yes P1382 = 0
# Password to lock/unlock. (0-9 only) P1383 =
# Do not escape "#" as 23% in SIP URL. 0 - No, 1 - Yes. Default is 0 P1406 = 0 # Display Language. # ar - Arabic, de - Deutsh # en - English, es - Spanish, fr - Francais # he - Hebrew, hr - Hrvatski, hu - Magyar # it - Italiano, ja - japanese, ko - korean # nl - Dutch, pl - Polski, pt - Portugue # ru - Russian, sl - Slovenian, zh-tw - traditional chinese # zh - simplified chinese, tr - Turkish, auto - Automatic, # gxp - Downloaded Language P1362 = %%langwebUI2%%
#Language File postfix (for Downloaded Language) #P399 =
#################################################################### # Account Settings #################################################################### #################################################################### # Primary Account (Account 1) Settings ####################################################################
# Account Active (In Use). 0 - no, 1 - yes P271 = 1
# Account Name P270 = %%extension_number%%
{IF network=LOCALLAN} # SIP Server Local configuration - Local internal IP Address of the server P47 = %%pbx_ip%%:%%param::sipport%% # Outbound Proxy - The "P48" field contains the ip address and SIP port of the SIP Outbound Proxy - in this case 3CXPS. The "pbx_ip" and "param::sipport" variables will be replaced by the IP Address and SIP Port of 3CXPS. P48 = # Local SIP port (default 5060) P40 = 5060 # NAT Traversal. 0 - no, 1 - STUN, 2 - keep alive, 3 - UPnP, 4 - Auto, 5 - VPN P52 = 2 {ENDIF}
{IF network=REMOTESTUN} # SIP Server configuration for remote using stun mode - External IP Address P47 = %%pbx_ip%%:%%param::sipport%% # Outbound Proxy - The "P48" field contains the ip address and SIP port of the SIP Outbound Proxy - in this case 3CXPS. The "pbx_ip" and "param::sipport" variables will be replaced by the IP Address and SIP Port of 3CXPS. P48 = # Local SIP port (default 5060) P40 = %%phonesipport%% # NAT Traversal. 0 - no, 1 - STUN, 2 - keep alive, 3 - UPnP, 4 - Auto, 5 - VPN P52 = 1 {ENDIF}
